ygData.subject: Re: Words, Runes, Pages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Found a Tashian Pg.24 on a crawler tonight ... Don t know exactly what s its for But I m taking n educated guess Enchanters -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis
ygData.messageBody:
> On the subject of words. I seem to find more words than anything else.
> This is good for me since I am a Necromancer. I have found most of them on
> DW crocs and DW Caimans in Oasis. I have also found words and Runes on
> Lavacrawlers in Lavastorm. There is no certain place where they are found,
> I think all upper level monsters drop them from time to time. I have a
> Druid friend who has found words, runes, and grimoire pages on Griffawns and
> Griffennes in the Karanas. I think I covered everything I wanted to. If
> there are any high level monks that know the basics of Dragon on
> Bristlebain, or anyone else who knows it, give me a tell in-game if you do
> not mind spamming me for a couple minutes to teach me the basice. I will
> gladly trade knowledge of my languages with you.
>
> Dalthas
> Dark Elf Necromancer
> Currently lvl 17
> Bristlebain
>

Found a Tashian Pg.24 on a crawler tonight ... Don't know exactly what's its for But I 'm taking n educated guess Enchanters




--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"But I've always been a Loner by Nature
and A Lurker by Want"

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

-----------------------------------------------------------
